bitField.name: Implementor
bitField.description: Indicates the implementor

bitField.name: Variant
bitField.description: Indicates the variant number, or major revision, of the processor

bitField.name: Architecture
bitField.description: Indicates whether the architecture is given in the feature registers

bitField.name: Primary_part_number
bitField.description: Indicates the part number

bitField.name: Revision
bitField.description: Indicates the revision number, or minor revision, of the processor

bitField.name: AFE
bitField.description: This bit controls the generation of Access Flag (AF) faults by AP[0].

bitField.name: TRE
bitField.description: This bit controls the TEX remap functionality in the MMU.

bitField.name: EE
bitField.description: This bit determines the setting of the CPSR E bit on taking an exception

bitField.name: VE
bitField.description: Configure vectored interrupt. Enables the VIC interface to determine the interrupt vectors

bitField.name: XP
bitField.description: This bit configures the hardware page translation mechanism

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: Enables unaligned data access operations, including support for mixed little-endian and big-endian operation.

bitField.name: FI
bitField.description: Configure fast interrupt configuration

bitField.name: IT
bitField.description: Global Instruction TCM enable/disable bit.

bitField.name: DT
bitField.description: Global Data TCM enable/disable bit

bitField.name: L4
bitField.description: Determines if the T bit is set when load instructions change the PC

bitField.name: RR
bitField.description: Replacement strategy for ICache and DCache

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Location of exception vectors

bitField.name: I
bitField.description: Level 1 Instruction Cache enable/disable

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Program Flow Enable/Disable.Program flow prediction includes static and dynamic branch prediction and the return stack.This bit enables all three forms of program flow prediction.

bitField.name: F
bitField.description: The meaning of this bit is Implementation-defined. For ARM1136JF-S processors, this bit Should Be Zero on writes and Reads As Zero on reads

bitField.name: ROM_protection
bitField.description: ROM Protection

bitField.name: Sys_protection
bitField.description: System protection. This bit modifies the MMU protection system

bitField.name: Endianness
bitField.description: Determines operation as little-endian or big-endian word invariant

bitField.name: W
bitField.description: Write buffer enable/disable.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Level 1 Data Cache enable/disable

bitField.name: A
bitField.description: Strict data address alignment fault checking

bitField.name: M
bitField.description: MMU enable/disable

bitField.name: CZ
bitField.description: Restrict cache size. This bit controls the restriction of cache size to 16KB. Restricting the cache to 16KB allows the processor to run software which does not support ARMv6 page coloring. The value of this bit does not affect the Cache Type Register.

bitField.name: RV
bitField.description: This bit controls block transfer cache operations

bitField.name: RA
bitField.description: Disable clean entire data cache. This bit controls the Clean Entire Data Cache and the Clean and Invalidate Entire Data Cache operations. If the RA bit is set, attempting a Clean (and Invalidate) Entire Data Cache operation will cause an Undefined Instruction exception.

bitField.name: TR
bitField.description: MicroTLB random replacement.This bit selects Random replacement for the MicroTLBs if the caches are configured to have Random replacement, using the RR bit in the Control Register

bitField.name: SB
bitField.description: Static branch prediction enable. This bit enables the use of static branch prediction if program flow prediction is enabled, using the Z bit of the Control Register

bitField.name: DB
bitField.description: Dynamic branch prediction enable. This bit enables the use of dynamic branch prediction if program flow prediction is enabled, using the Z bit of the Control Register

bitField.name: RS
bitField.description: Return stack enable. This bit enables the use of the return stack if program flow prediction is enabled, using the Z bit of the Control Register

bitField.name: CP13
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 13

bitField.name: CP12
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 12

bitField.name: CP11
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 11

bitField.name: CP10
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 10

bitField.name: CP9
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 9

bitField.name: CP8
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 8

bitField.name: CP7
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 7

bitField.name: CP6
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 6

bitField.name: CP5
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 5

bitField.name: CP4
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 4

bitField.name: CP3
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 3

bitField.name: CP2
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 2

bitField.name: CP1
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 1

bitField.name: CP0
bitField.description: Access permissions for Coprocessor 0

bitField.name: ILsize
bitField.description: The number of instruction TLB lockable entries.

bitField.name: DLsize
bitField.description: The number of unified or data TLB lockable entries.

bitField.name: U
bitField.description: Specifies if the TLB is unified (0), or if there are separate instruction and data TLBs (1).

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to non-shared or to shared memory.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is inner cacheable or inner noncacheable.

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Indicates the outer cacheable attributes for translation table walking.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is to non-shared or to shared memory.

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Indicates the translation table walk is inner cacheable or inner noncacheable.

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Specifies the boundary size of Translation Table Base Register 0.

bitField.name: D15
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D15

bitField.name: D14
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D14

bitField.name: D13
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D13

bitField.name: D12
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D12

bitField.name: D11
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D11

bitField.name: D10
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D10

bitField.name: D9
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D9

bitField.name: D8
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D8

bitField.name: D7
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D7

bitField.name: D6
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D6

bitField.name: D5
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D5

bitField.name: D4
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D4

bitField.name: D3
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D3

bitField.name: D2
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D2

bitField.name: D1
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D1

bitField.name: D0
bitField.description: Defines the access permissions for domain D0

bitField.name: RW
bitField.description: Indicates whether a read or write access caused an abort.

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Indicates which one of the 16 domains, D15-D0, is accessed when a data fault occurs.

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated. To determine [10] must be used in conjunction with bits [3:0].

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the type of exception generated.

register.name: TLB_INVALIDATE_ASID
register.gui_name: Invalidate Unified TLB Entry on ASID match
register.description: Invalidate Unified TLB Entry on ASID match

register.name: TLB_INVALIDATE_I_ASID
register.gui_name: Invalidate Instruction TLB Entry on ASID match
register.description: Invalidate Instruction TLB Entry on ASID match

register.name: TLB_INVALIDATE_D_ASID
register.gui_name: Invalidate Data TLB Entry on ASID match
register.description: Invalidate Data TLB Entry on ASID match

bitField.name: Victim
bitField.description: Specifies the entry in the lockdown region where a subsequent hardware page table walk can place a TLB entry.

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Determines if subsequent hardware page table walks place a TLB entry in the lockdown region or in the set associative region of the TLB.

register.name: PID
register.description: The FCSE PID Register provides the ProcID for fast context switch memory mappings. The MMU uses the contents of this register to map memory addresses in the range 0-32MB.

bitField.name: FCSE_PID
bitField.description: Identifies a specific process for fast context switch.Holds the ProcID. The reset value is 0.

register.name: CID
register.description: The purpose of the Context ID Register is to provide information on the current ASID and process ID, for example for the ETM and debug logic.

bitField.name: PROCID
bitField.description: Extends the ASID to form the process ID and identifies the current process

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: Holds the ASID of the current process to identify the current ASID

bitField.name: Outer_write_back_no_write_on_allocate
bitField.gui_name: Outer Write-Back, No Write on Allocate
bitField.description: Outer Write-Back, No Write on Allocate

bitField.description: Outer Write-Through, No Write on Allocate

bitField.name: Outer_write_back
bitField.description: Outer Write-Back, Write on Allocate

bitField.name: Outer_noncacheable
bitField.description: Outer Noncacheable

bitField.name: Sh_attr_remap_S_bit_1
bitField.description: Shared attribute remapping if Shared bit = 1 (shared)

bitField.name: Sh_attr_remap_S_bit_0
bitField.gui_name: Shared attribute remapping if not shared
bitField.description: Shared attribute remapping if Shared bit = 0 (not shared)

bitField.description: Inner Write-Back

bitField.name: Inner_WT
bitField.description: Inner Write-Through

bitField.name: Strongly_ordered

bitField.description: Inner Noncacheable

bitField.description: Outer Write-Back, Write on Allocate

bitField.description: Shared attribute remapping if Shared bit = 1 (shared)

bitField.name: Sh_attr_remap_S_bit_0
bitField.gui_name: Shared attribute remapping if not shared

bitField.name: Inner_WB
bitField.description: Inner Write-Back

bitField.description: Inner Write-Through

bitField.name: Device
bitField.description: Device

bitField.name: Strongly_ordered
bitField.description: Strongly Ordered

bitField.name: Inner_noncacheable
bitField.description: Inner Noncacheable

bitField.name: Base_addr
bitField.description: Gives the physical base address of the region of memory to be remapped to the peripheral port. If the Peripheral Port Memory Remap Register is used while the MMU is disabled, the virtual base address is equal to the physical base address that is used.

bitField.name: Size
bitField.description: Indicates the size of the memory region that is to be remapped to be used by the peripheral port.

bitField.name: CH1
bitField.description: Provides information on DMA Channel 1 functions.

bitField.name: CH0
bitField.description: Provides information on DMA Channel 0 functions.

bitField.name: CH1
bitField.description: Provides information on DMA Channel 1 functions.

bitField.name: CH0
bitField.description: Provides information on DMA Channel 0 functions.

bitField.name: CH1
bitField.description: Provides information on DMA Channel 1 functions.

bitField.name: CH0
bitField.description: Provides information on DMA Channel 0 functions.

bitField.name: CH1
bitField.description: Provides information on DMA Channel 1 functions.

bitField.name: CH0
bitField.description: Provides information on DMA Channel 0 functions.

bitField.name: U1
bitField.description: Indicates if a User mode process can access the registers for channel 1.

bitField.name: U0
bitField.description: Indicates if a User mode process can access the registers for channel 0.

bitField.name: CN
bitField.description: Indicates DMA channel selected.

bitField.name: TR
bitField.description: Indicates target TCM

bitField.name: DT
bitField.description: Indicates direction of transfer.

bitField.name: IC
bitField.description: Interrupt on Completion. Indicates whether the DMA channel must assert an interrupt on completion of the DMA transfer, or if the Stop command stops the DMA.

bitField.name: IE
bitField.description: Interrupt on Error. Indicates that the DMA channel must assert an interrupt on an error. The interrupt is deasserted from this source, when the channel is set to idle with a clear operation.

bitField.name: FT
bitField.description: Full Transfer. Indicates that the DMA transfers all words of data as part of the DMA that is transferring data from the TCM to the external memory

bitField.name: UM
bitField.description: User Mode. Indicates that the permission checks are based on the DMA in User or privileged mode. The UM bit is provided so that the privileged mode process can emulate User mode accesses.

bitField.name: ST
bitField.description: STride (in bytes). Indicates the increment on the external address between each consecutive access of the DMA. A Stride of zero, reset value, indicates that the external address is not to be incremented. This is designed to facilitate the accessing of volatile locations such as a FIFO

bitField.name: TS
bitField.description: Transaction Size. Indicates the size of the transactions that the DMA channel performs. This is particularly important for Device or Strongly Ordered memory locations because it ensures that accesses to such memory occur at their programmed size.

bitField.name: BP
bitField.description: Indicates whether the DMA parameters are acceptable, or are conditioned inappropriately

bitField.name: ES
bitField.description: External address error Status. Indicates the status of the External Address Error

bitField.name: IS
bitField.description: Indicates the status of the Internal Address Error

bitField.name: Status
bitField.description: Indicates the status of the DMA channel.

bitField.name: PROCID
bitField.description: Extends the ASID to form the process ID and identify the current process

bitField.name: ASID
bitField.description: Holds the ASID of the current process and identifies the current ASID

bitField.name: Outer_write_back_no_write_on_allocate
bitField.description: Outer Write-back, No Write on Allocate

bitField.name: Outer_write_through_no_write_on_allocate
bitField.description: Outer Write-Through, No Write on Allocate

bitField.name: Outer_write_back
bitField.description: Outer Write-Back, Write on Allocate

bitField.name: Outer_noncacheable
bitField.description: Outer Noncacheable

bitField.name: Sh_attr_remap_S_bit_1
bitField.description: Shared attribute remapping if Shared bit = 1 (shared)

bitField.name: Sh_attr_remap_S_bit_0
bitField.description: Shared attribute remapping if Shared bit = 0 (not shared)

bitField.name: Inner_WB
bitField.description: Inner Write-Back

bitField.name: Inner_WT
bitField.description: Inner Write-Through

bitField.name: Device
bitField.description: Device

bitField.name: Strongly_ordered
bitField.description: Strongly Ordered

bitField.name: Inner_noncacheable
bitField.description: Inner Noncacheable

bitField.name: Evt_count_0
bitField.description: Identifies the source of events for Count Register 0

bitField.name: Evt_count_1
bitField.description: Identifies the source of events for Count Register 1

bitField.name: X
bitField.description: Enable Export of the events to the event bus. This enables an external monitoring block, such as the ETM to trace events

bitField.name: CCR
bitField.description: Cycle Count Register 0 overflow flag.

bitField.name: CR_1
bitField.description: Count Register 1 overflow flag.

bitField.name: CR_0
bitField.description: Count Register 0 overflow flag.

bitField.name: ECC_intr
bitField.description: Enable Cycle Counter interrupt.

bitField.name: EC_1_intr
bitField.description: Enable Counter Register 1 interrupt.

bitField.name: EC_0_Intr
bitField.description: Enable Counter Register 0 interrupt.

bitField.name: D
bitField.description: Cycle count divider

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cycle Counter Register Reset on Write, UNP on Read

bitField.name: P
bitField.description: Count Register Reset on Write, UNP on Read

bitField.name: E
bitField.description: Enables or Disables all the three counters

bitField.name: Ctype
bitField.description: Specifies if the cache supports lockdown or not, and how it is cleaned

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Specifies if the cache is a Unified Cache, S=0, or separate ICache and DCache, S=1

bitField.name: Dsize_P
bitField.description: The P bit indicates if there is a restriction on page allocation for bits [13:12] of the Virtual Address

bitField.name: Dsize_Size
bitField.description: The Size field determines the cache size in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: Dsize_Assoc
bitField.description: The Assoc field determines the cache associativity in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: Dsize_M
bitField.description: The multiplier bit determines the cache size and cache associativity values in conjunction with the Size and Assoc fields. If the cache is present, M must be set to 0. If the cache is absent, M must be set to 1.

bitField.name: Dsize_Len
bitField.description: The Len field determines the line length of the cache

bitField.name: Isize_P
bitField.description: The P bit indicates if there is a restriction on page allocation for bits [13:12] of the Virtual Address

bitField.name: Isize_Size
bitField.description: The Size field determines the cache size in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: Isize_Assoc
bitField.description: The Assoc field determines the cache associativity in conjunction with the M bit

bitField.name: Isize_M
bitField.description: The multiplier bit determines the cache size and cache associativity values in conjunction with the Size and Assoc fields. If the cache is present, M must be set to 0. If the cache is absent, M must be set to 1.

bitField.name: Isize_Len
bitField.description: The Len field determines the line length of the cache

register.name: CACHE_INVALIDATE_D_MVA
register.gui_name: Invalidate Data Cache Line, using MVA
register.description: Invalidate Data Cache Line, using MVA

register.name: CACHE_INVALIDATE_D_SI
register.gui_name: Invalidate Data Cache Line, using Set/Way

register.gui_name: Clean Data Cache Line, using MVA

register.gui_name: Clean Data Cache Line, using Set/Way
register.description: Clean Data Cache Line, using Set/Way

register.name: CACHE_CLEAN_INVALIDATE_D
register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate Entire Data Cache
register.description: Clean and Invalidate Entire Data Cache

register.name: CACHE_CLEAN_INVALIDATE_D_MVA
register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Line, using MVA
register.description: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Line, using MVA

register.name: CACHE_CLEAN_INVALIDATE_D_SI
register.gui_name: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Line, using Set/Way
register.description: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Line, using Set/Way

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Cache Dirty Status Register is to indicate when the Cache is dirty

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: The R bit indicates if there is a block prefetch operation in progress

bitField.name: D_cache_way_3
bitField.description: Locks cache way 3.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: D_cache_way_2
bitField.description: Locks cache way 2.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: D_cache_way_1
bitField.description: Locks cache way 1.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: D_cache_way_0
bitField.description: Locks cache way 0.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: I_cache_way_3
bitField.description: Locks cache way 3.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: I_cache_way_2
bitField.description: Locks cache way 2.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: I_cache_way_1
bitField.description: Locks cache way 1.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

bitField.name: I_cache_way_0
bitField.description: Locks cache way 1.If a cache way is not implemented, then the L bit for that way is hardwired to 1, and writes to that bit are ignored.

register.name: CLEAN_INVALIDATE_DATA_CACHE_RANGE
register.description: Clean and Invalidate Data Cache Range

bitField.name: DTCM
bitField.description: Specifies the number of Data TCMs implemented.

bitField.name: ITCM
bitField.description: Specifies the number of Instruction TCMs implemented

bitField.name: Base_address
bitField.description: The physical base address of the Instruction TCM

bitField.name: Size
bitField.description: The Size field reflects the value of the IRSIZE macrocell inputs.

bitField.name: SC
bitField.description: Indicates if the TCM is enabled as SmartCache

bitField.name: En
bitField.description: Enables or Disables Instruction TCM

bitField.name: Base_address
bitField.description: The physical base address of the Data TCM

bitField.name: Size
bitField.description: The Size field reflects the value of the DRSIZE macrocell inputs.

bitField.name: SC
bitField.description: Indicates if the TCM is enabled as SmartCache

bitField.name: En
bitField.description: Enables or Disables Data TCM

register.name: INSTR_CACHE_DATA_RAM_READ_OP
register.gui_name: Instruction Cache Data RAM Read Operation
register.description: Instruction Cache Data RAM Read Operation

bitField.name: Write_through
bitField.description: Write-Through enable flag

bitField.name: Icache_line_fill
bitField.description: Instruction cache Linefill disable flag

bitField.name: Dcache_line_fill
bitField.description: Data cache line fill disable flag

bitField.name: TLB_data_index
bitField.description: Indicates which entry in the MicroTLB is accessed. Permitted values are b0000 to b1010, decimal 0 to 10.

bitField.name: TLB_instruction_index
bitField.description: Indicates which entry in the MicroTLB is accessed. Permitted values are b0000 to b1010, decimal 0 to 10.

bitField.name: Lockable_region
bitField.description: Lockable region. Indicates whether the index refers to the lockable region or the set-associative region

bitField.name: Index
bitField.description: Indicates which entry in the main TLB is accessed. The meaning of this field depends on the setting of the L bit: L = 0 Index[5] indicates which Way of the main TLB set-associative region is being accessed. Index[4:0] indexes the Set of the RAM. L = 1 Index[5:3] SBZ. Index[2:0] indicates which entry in the lockable region is being accessed.

bitField.name: L
bitField.description: Lockable region. Indicates whether the index refers to the lockable region or the set-associative region

bitField.name: Index
bitField.description: Indicates which entry in the main TLB is accessed. The meaning of this field depends on the setting of the L bit: L = 0 Index[5] indicates which Way of the main TLB set-associative region is being accessed.Index[4:0] indexes the Set of the RAM. L = 1 Index[5:3] SBZ. Index[2:0] indicates which entry in the lockable region is being accessed.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual Address.Bits of the virtual address that are not translated as part of the page table translation, because of the region size, are Unpredictable when read, and Should Be Zero when written

bitField.name: Process
bitField.description: Memory space identifier that determines if the entry is a global mapping, or an ASID dependent entry.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual Address. Bits of the virtual address that are not translated as part of the page table translation, because of the region size, are Unpredictable when read, and Should Be Zero when written

bitField.name: Process
bitField.description: Memory space identifier that determines if the entry is a global mapping, or an ASID dependent entry.

bitField.name: VA
bitField.description: Virtual Address. Bits of the virtual address that are not translated as part of the page table translation, because of the region size, are Unpredictable when read, and Should Be Zero when written

bitField.name: Process
bitField.description: Memory space identifier that determines if the entry is a global mapping, or an ASID dependent entry.

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Bits of the physical address that are not translated as part of the page table translation are Unpredictable when read and Should Be Zero when written

bitField.name: SZ
bitField.description: Region size

bitField.name: XRGN
bitField.description: Extended Region Type

bitField.name: AP
bitField.description: Access Permissions. For MicroTLB entries this field contains the access permissions for the subpage that is contained in that MicroTLB entry for main TLB entries, this register contains the access permission fields for the first subpage, or for the entire page/section if the page does not support subpages.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Valid bit. Indicates that this TLB entry is valid.

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Bits of the physical address that are not translated as part of the page table translation are Unpredictable when read and Should Be Zero when written

bitField.name: SZ
bitField.description: Region size

bitField.name: XRGN
bitField.description: Extended Region Type

bitField.name: AP
bitField.description: Access Permissions. For MicroTLB entries this field contains the access permissions for the subpage that is contained in that MicroTLB entry. For main TLB entries, this register contains the access permission fields for the first subpage, or for the entire page/section if the page does not support subpages.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Valid bit. Indicates that this TLB entry is valid.

bitField.name: PA
bitField.description: Bits of the physical address that are not translated as part of the page table translation are Unpredictable when read and Should Be Zero when written

bitField.name: SZ
bitField.description: Region size

bitField.name: XRGN
bitField.description: Extended Region Type

bitField.name: AP
bitField.description: Access Permissions. For MicroTLB entries this field contains the access permissions for the subpage that is contained in that MicroTLB entry. For main TLB entries, this register contains the access permission fields for the first subpage, or for the entire page/section if the page does not support subpages.

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Valid bit. Indicates that this TLB entry is valid.

bitField.name: SPV
bitField.description: Subpage Valid. Indicates that the page or section supports subpages. Pages that support subpages must be marked as Global. Attempting to use subpages with non-global pages has Unpredictable results

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Domain number of the TLB entry

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Region type.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Shared Attribute

bitField.name: SPV
bitField.description: Subpage Valid. Indicates that the page or section supports subpages. Pages that support subpages must be marked as Global. Attempting to use subpages with non-global pages has Unpredictable results

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Domain number of the TLB entry

bitField.name: XN
bitField.description: Execute Never attribute.

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Region type.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Shared Attribute

bitField.name: AP3
bitField.description: Subpage access permissions for the fourth subpage if the page or section supports subpages. Unpredictable on read and Should Be Zero on a write if the entry does not support subpages.

bitField.name: AP2
bitField.description: Subpage access permissions for the third subpage if the page or section supports subpages. Unpredictable on read and Should Be Zero on a write if the entry does not support subpages.

bitField.name: AP1
bitField.description: Subpage access permissions for the second subpage if the page or section supports subpages. Unpredictable on read and Should Be Zero on a write if the entry does not support subpages.

bitField.name: SPV
bitField.description: Subpage Valid. Indicates that the page or section supports subpages. Pages that support subpages must be marked as Global. Attempting to use subpages with non-global pages has Unpredictable results

bitField.name: Domain
bitField.description: Domain number of the TLB entry

bitField.name: XN
bitField.description: Execute Never attribute.

bitField.name: RGN
bitField.description: Region type.

bitField.name: S
bitField.description: Shared Attribute

bitField.name: Instr_main_TLB_match
bitField.description: Instruction Main TLB Match:

bitField.name: Data_main_TLB_match
bitField.description: Data Main TLB Match:

bitField.description: Instruction Main TLB Load

bitField.name: Data_main_TLB_load
bitField.description: Data Main TLB Load

bitField.name: Instr_unit_match
bitField.description: Instruction Unit Match

bitField.name: Data_unit_match
bitField.description: Data Unit Match

bitField.name: Instr_unit_load
bitField.description: Instruction Unit Load

bitField.name: Data_unit_load
bitField.description: Data Unit Load

bitField.name: Implementor
bitField.description: Indicates the implementor

bitField.name: SW
bitField.description: VFP Implementation. Shows whether FP is implemented in Hardware and Software

bitField.name: Format
bitField.description: FSTMX or FLDMX format

bitField.name: SNG
bitField.description: Precisions supported

bitField.name: Architecture
bitField.description: Shows the VFP Coprocessor architecture version

bitField.name: Part_num
bitField.description: Part Number

bitField.name: Variant
bitField.description: Variant

bitField.name: Revision
bitField.description: Revision

bitField.name: N
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces a less than result

bitField.name: Z
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an equal result

bitField.name: C
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an equal, greater than, or unordered result

bitField.name: V
bitField.description: Set if comparison produces an unordered result

bitField.name: DN
bitField.description: Default NaN mode enable bit:

bitField.name: FZ
bitField.description: Flush-to-zero mode enable bit

bitField.name: R_MODE
bitField.description: Rounding mode control field

bitField.name: Stride
bitField.description: The vector stride is the increment value used to select the registers involved in the next iteration of the short vector instruction

bitField.name: LEN
bitField.description: Controls the vector length for VFP instructions that operate on short vectors. The vector length is the number of iterations in a short vector instruction.

bitField.name: IDE
bitField.description: Input Subnormal exception enable bit

bitField.name: IXE
bitField.description: Inexact exception enable bit

bitField.name: UFE
bitField.description: Underflow exception enable bit

bitField.name: OFE
bitField.description: Overflow exception enable bit

bitField.name: DZE
bitField.description: Division by Zero exception enable bit

bitField.name: IOE
bitField.description: Invalid Operation exception enable bit

bitField.name: IDC
bitField.description: Input Subnormal cumulative flag

bitField.name: IXC
bitField.description: Inexact cumulative flag

bitField.name: UFC
bitField.description: Underflow cumulative flag

bitField.name: OFC
bitField.description: Overflow cumulative flag

bitField.name: DZC
bitField.description: Division by Zero cumulative flag

bitField.name: IOC
bitField.description: Invalid Operation cumulative flag

bitField.name: EX
bitField.description: Exception Flag

bitField.name: EN
bitField.description: VFP enable bit.

bitField.name: FP2V
bitField.description: FPINST2 instruction valid flag

bitField.name: VECITR
bitField.description: VECITR contains the number of remaining short vector iterations after a potential exception was detected in one of the iterations

bitField.name: INV
bitField.description: Input exception flag

bitField.name: UFC
bitField.description: Potential underflow flag

bitField.name: OFC
bitField.description: Potential overflow flag.

bitField.name: IOC
bitField.description: Potential invalid operation flag

bitField.name: VFP_HW_support_level
bitField.description: Indicates the VFP hardware support level when user traps are disabled.

bitField.name: Short_vectors_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for short vectors.

bitField.name: HW_square_root_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for hardware square root

bitField.name: HW_Division_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for hardware divide.

bitField.name: User_traps_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for user traps.

bitField.name: Double_precision_Support
bitField.description: Indicates support for double precision VFP

bitField.name: Single_precision_Support
bitField.description: Indicates support for single precision VFP.

bitField.name: Media_reg_bank_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for the media register bank.

bitField.name: Media_ext_Single_precision_FP_instr_suport
bitField.description: Indicates support for media extension, single precision floating point instructions.

bitField.name: Media_ext_integer_instr_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for media extension, integer instructions.

bitField.name: Media_ext_Load_store_support
bitField.description: Indicates support for media extension, load/store instructions.
